name: Ludo, but inaccurate
description:
So like one day I was like... bro, ludo, yeah, the board game, i should make that in Gamemaker

so here i am. spent a whole week of time wasted making this. And its full of bugs right now. 

You can use the F keys (f1 f2 f3 etc. ) to change the number of the die at any time. some good cheating if you ask me. Also you can press f10 to get 32 turns which is almost one whole trip around the board.
